pkgmetadata.longdescription: R API for Trello // Provides access to Trello API (https://developers.trello.com/). A family of GET functions make it easy to retrieve cards, labels, members, teams and other data from both public and private boards. Server responses are formatted upon retrieval. Automated paging allows for large requests that exceed server limit. See https://github.com/jchrom/trelloR for more information.
